a little something to hold us over!

A lots good things here but the sandbox aspect of carrer seems to be a little more limited now. Well it's a good thing that tey keep the .23 style carrer even though it is not as challenging.

New carrer for me, stock on one save and modded on another.
That's what the sandbox mode is for, after all. It wouldn't be a career if it wasn't limited - the point of career mode is that you push the limit yourself.

Thanks for all your efforts and the informations behind the scene. This transparency and the constant proof of will to deliver an awesome product is, what makes KSP stick out among all the other early access games. Here is an honest thank you to all you guys at Squad! Keep on flyin'

Will newly generated contracts always use the "best available" parameters for creation? So say I have good reputation and a tech level capable of reaching Jool will the majority of newly generated contracts be geared towards doing things around Jool (test part X while orbiting Jool, rescue Kerbal Y from Lathe, etc), or will there still be plenty of contracts popup to test parts and do things closer to Kerbin?

I've not yet gotten around to leaving Kerbin's SOI (not for lack of parts or knowledge, just been having plenty of fun close to home) so I'm a little worried that after a while the "local" contracts will simply dry up I'll be forced to go to far off places to get funding simply because the amount of science I have says I can go there, whether I actually want to start moving further afield at that point or not.
